About Me

Hi there, I’m Diego Guancha ,

Among a ton of things that define us as human beings, I’m essentially a pentesting and red teaming enthusiast. I started tinkering with Kali Linux when I was about 14 years old, I was into hacking so bad, yet ended up quitting over time. Now I’m 21 and happy to be back in the game.

I’m an eJPTv2 holder and I’m currently looking forward to getting the eCPPTv2.

Customer Service Representative, Teleperformance

12/2021 — 10/2022

Answered to customer requests via outbound phone calls, emails, and chats for one of the largest payment processing companies in the world. At all times I maintained a professional and friendly attitude with customers while working in an efficient and organized manner to get appropriate answers to specific questions within minutes in collaboration with a global team from +3 countries.
